mapper.select: SELECT word_num, word_meaning, word_content, word_chinese FROM word WHERE word_level = #{level} ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO record (username, record_level, record_date, record_point, record_kind) values (#{username}, #{level}, now(), #{point}, #{kind})

SELECT max(record_num) FROM record
INSERT INTO record_detail (record_num, username, word_num, rd_check, record_value) VALUES
(#{record_num}, #{username}, #{item.word_num}, #{item.result_check}, #{item.dataValue})

SELECT ctr_num FROM choice_test_result WHERE username = #{username} ORDER BY ctr_num DESC limit 1
INSERT INTO choice_test_result (username, ctr_total_count, ctr_answer_count, ctr_inAnswer_count, ctr_time, state, created_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{ctrTotalCount}, #{ctrAnswerCount}, #{ctrInAnswerCount}, #{ctrTime}, 0, NOW())

INSERT INTO choice_test_result_detail (ctr_num, word_num, ctrd_question_one, ctrd_question_two, ctrd_question_three, ctrd_question_four, ctrd_question_answer, ctrd_choice_num, ctrd_answer_content, ctrd_answer_meaning, ctrd_answer_chinese, ctrd_result, state, created_at) VALUES
(#{ctrNum}, #{vo.wordNum}, #{vo.ctrdQuestionOne}, #{vo.ctrdQuestionTwo}, #{vo.ctrdQuestionThree}, #{vo.ctrdQuestionFour}, #{vo.ctrdQuestionAnswer}, #{vo.ctrdChoiceNum}, #{vo.ctrdAnswerContent}, #{vo.ctrdAnswerMeaning}, #{vo.ctrdAnswerChinese}, #{vo.ctrdResult}, 0, NOW() )
